text: Nena, “Ine sindipeza china chilichonse mu zimene zavumbulutsidwa kwa ine choletsa aliyense kudya chakudya china chilichonse kupatula nyama yofa yokha kapena liwende kapena nyama ya nkhumba, chifukwa zimenezo ndi zauve ndi zodetsedwa kapena nyama ina iliyonse imene yaphedwa osati mu dzina la Mulungu. Koma aliyense amene waumirizidwa kudya chilichonse cha izi, osati mokondweretsedwa kapena ndi cholinga chofuna kuswa malamulo, ndithudi, Ambuye wako ndi wokhululukira ndi wachisoni chosatha.”
